DOC.HEADLINE: ' 94 WINTER_OLYMPICS / LILLEHAMMER ; NOTEBOOK
DOC.TEXT: Tim Tetrault of Norwich , Vt. , who competes on the U.S. Nordic combined team , slipped_on the ice in downtown Lillehammer on Saturday night and suffered a broken left leg . Tetrault , who had finished 30th in the individual Nordic event -- it combines ski_jumping and cross-country_skiing -- was also scheduled to compete in the team version of the event , starting Wednesday . He was treated by the U.S. team ' s medical staff , who X-rayed the injury and put a cast_on Tetrault ' s leg . MIKE KUPPER
